text:
When trying to run a previously saved test plan, the server defaults from the HTTP Request Defaults are being overridden by the space character (inserted during the save) in the server and port fields of the HTTP Request.

Nightly build: 9/13/2002

Steps to reproduce:
Create a test that includes:
HTTP Request Defaults  (set a server and port)
HTTP Request (set a path)
View Results Tree (not needed to reproduce but makes seeing the error easier)
Save the test
File | New  (to clear the test plan)
File | Open (open the just saved test plan)
Run | Start 

Test will fail as the HTTP defaults are discarded in favor of the space char in the server field of the HTTP Request.
creator: mjuliana@netflix.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 12571 ***
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
